com.ctc.wstx.util

Class XmlChars

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ctc.wstx.util.XmlChars

  • public final class XmlChars
extends Object
    Simple utility class that encapsulates logic of determining validity of characters outside basic 7-bit range of Unicode, for XML 1.0
